member.name: T:DataDetail.DataDetailDialog
member.summary: The DataDetail Dynamic Detail dialog.

remarks.para: The DataDetailDialog form is designed to dynamically create a Detail Dialog to allow display and edit of Data Record values which are contained in the LJCDataColumns (DbColumns) collection.

The Dialog contains one or more Tab pages. Each TabPage is represented by a LJCDataDetailDAL.ControlTab object. A TabPage contains one or more ControlColumn objects. Each ControlColumn object can contain multiple ControlRow objects.
The DataDetail project contains forms for dynamically displaying data.
The DataDetailDialog form dynamically displays a detail view of the data. This can be used to create or edit data records.

member.name: M:DataDetail.DataDetailDialog.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an object instance.

remarks.para: Creates a private LJCDataDetailDAL.DataDetailData object to provide simplified interaction with the database.

Calls DataDetailData.GetControlDetail() to create a private LJCDataDetailDAL.ControlDetail object to contain the dialog configuration retrieved from the database. A default configuration is created if a database configuration is not found.

member.name: M:DataDetail.DataDetailDialog.DataRetrieve
member.summary: Retrieves the initial control data.

member.name: M:DataDetail.DataDetailDialog.ControlRow(LJCDataDetailDAL.ControlColumn,LJCNetCommon.DbColumn,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Creates the ControlRow and associated controls.
member.remarks: This method creates and positions the controls for a ControlRow. It creates a ControlRow definition and adds it to the private mControlRows collection.
